There is a Sims2EP1.exe named file in the crack directory. If you shall do something wrong and the game shall crash, overwrite this file in the TSBin directory. (This is the original file) Read the NFO file for more help!

How to install:

1. Run the Sims2EP1_crack.exe file
2. Run daemon347.exe to install Daemon Tools. (you'll need it, the alcohol is not good)
3. Mount the image what the crack installer installed into your The Sims 2 University directory
4. Run the TNTS2_E1.EXE file! DON'T COPY IT TO ANY DIRECTORIES! MUST BE IN THE SIMS 2 UNIVERSITY DIRECTORY!
4. Restart Windows
5. Play the game, but don't forget! TAKE OUT THE CD BECOSE IT WILL NOT WORK!
